input_text:
Job Title: Sales Development Manager - Entry Level

Location: Miami-Dade County, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Advertising, Marketing, Sales

Description:
Sales Development Manager - Entry Level
Company Overview:Magic5 is a vibrant and forward-thinking organization dedicated to providing outstanding products/services while nurturing positive connections with our esteemed clientele.
We are in search of a motivated and proficient individual to join our team as a Sports-Minded Event Sales Coordinator.
Job Description:As an Entry Level Sales Development Manager, you will play a crucial role in driving revenue growth and expanding our client base. This position offers an exciting opportunity for individuals who are passionate about sales and eager to kick-start their careers in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. You will receive comprehensive training and mentorship to develop the skills and knowledge necessary to excel in this role and advance within our organization.
Responsibilities:Initiate and maintain relationships with potential clients.Conduct product presentation and execute sales.Collaborate with the the team to develop and execute sales strategies and achieve targets.Utilize CRM software to track leads, manage accounts, and monitor sales activities.Gather feedback from prospects to identify opportunities for improvement and optimization.Stay informed about industry trends, market conditions, and competitor offerings to effectively position our solutions.Participate in sales meetings, training sessions, and professional development activities to enhance sales skills and knowledge.
Qualifications:High School Diploma or equivalent as a minimum requirement.Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and establish trust with prospects.Motivated self-starter with a positive attitude and willingness to learn.Ability to work independently as well as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and CRM software.Excellent organizational and time management skills, with great attention to detail.Desire to pursue a career in sales and a commitment to achieving results.
Benefits:Comprehensive training and mentorship program to support your professional development and career advancement.Competitive pay and bonuses.Opportunity to work with a talented and supportive team in a collaborative environment.Exciting and challenging work that allows you to make a direct impact on our company's success.Ongoing opportunities for learning, growth, and recognition based on performance.
Apply Now:Sales Development Manager - Entry Level

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

Conduct product presentations and execute sales

Utilize CRM software to track leads, manage accounts, and monitor sales activities
Gather feedback from prospects to identify opportunities for improvement
Stay informed about industry trends, market conditions, and competitor offerings
Participate in sales meetings, training sessions, and professional development activities

Ongoing opportunities for learning, growth, and recognition based on performance
